Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that uses string and cups (or similar tools) to send and receive sound information over a distance.
The student can show how the string telephone allows people to communicate over long distances.
The student can visually represent the necessary materials provided (such as a string and paper cups) used to create the device.
The student can illustrate how the sound travels along the string from one person to another.
The student can depict the use of the device by two students, demonstrating the communication process.
The student can highlight any features of the device that ensure it can send information over a specified distance and explain how it works.
